caption.center: Charles THOMAS, Movant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Opposed.

opinion.posture:
Appeal from Larue Circuit Court, Cecil C. Wilson, Special Judge.
Motion for an appeal from Larue Circuit Court. Judgment imposing fine of $50 and confinement in jail for 30 days for selling intoxicating beverages in local option territory.
opinion.attorneys:
Fulton Hubbard for movant.
A.E. Funk, Attorney General and Wm. F. Simpson, Assistant Attorney General, opposed.
